page.title: 12COOKSMILL GREEN CHAPEL
page.content: This independent chapel was built in {COOKSMILL GREEN}in 1866.Inside it is bright and welcoming.Services on Sun- day evenings last about an hour and are led by a visiting preacher.Between 20 & 30 people attend.Their favourite hymn is Trust and Obey.Sunday School for children is in the morning. The Chapel is famous in the area for the large amounts of money it raises.A Pop Group,"People of the Green" and a choir,"Monday Nighters"often give con- certs for charity.The Chapel owns the field next to it and lets it to tour- ing caravans.All the profits go to charity as does money raised by the teas and suppers provided by the resi- dent caretaker. The Chapel's special day is the cele- bration of their Anniversary in July when guests join the regulars for spe- cial services,refreshments and music.
